center_panel.button-css: height: 25px; font-weight: normal; background-color: #5cecea; color:  #035b5e; border: 4px solid #028090; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px;
center_panel.button-hover-css: font-weight: bold; background-color: #1a6d6c; color: #2cf0dd; border: 3px solid #028090; border-radius: 15px; padding: 15px;
center_panel.button-pressed-css: font-weight: lighter; background-color: #5cecea; color: #028090; border: none;

settings-css.button-css: height: 20px; font-weight: normal; background-color: #028090; color: #5cecea; border: 4px solid #035b5e; border-radius: 15px;  padding: 15px;
settings-css.button-hover-css: font-weight: bold; background-color: #5be7f9; color: #156d6c; border: 3px solid #028090; border-radius: 15px; padding: 15px;
settings-css.button-pressed-css: font-weight: lighter; background-color: #035b5e; color: #028090; border: none;
settings-css.card-css: text-align: left; border: 3px solid #ccc; border-radius: 20px; padding: 10px; background-color: #03a6b1; color: #0e2325;

right_panel.chat-text-css: border: 2px solid #ccc; border-radius: 20px; padding: 10px; background-color: #028090; color: white;
right_panel.user-message-css: vertical-align: text-top; border: 3px solid #755c09; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px; margin-left: 10px; margin-right: 100px; background-color: #e8bf87; color: #063a4e;
right_panel.ai-message-css: vertical-align: text-top; border: 4px solid #028090; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px; margin-left: 100px; background-color: #4FBDBA; color: #045152;
